title: Mobile Training Program for Strengthening Elementary Mathematics Teachers' Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of elementary mathematics curriculum and teaching methodologies
context.additional_context: Flexible teacher training program through smartphone-based mobile learning, focusing on practical competency development for improving mathematics pedagogy.

learning_goals: Ability to design implementation plans for three or more blended teaching methodologies (online-offline integration) in mobile learning environments
Development of 3-stage integrated learning scenarios per elementary mathematics unit based on the ILDF framework
Creation and utilization of five or more types of mathematics teaching-learning materials using smartphone apps
Improvement of mobile learning content two or more times based on peer teacher feedback

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
